scripts.forever: sudo forever -p ~/tol-node-public/tol2-test --pidFile ~/tol-node-public/tol2-test/tol-node-public-TEST-55556.pid --minUptime 3000 --spinSleepTime 3000 -a start -c 'nodemon --exitcrash --delay 10' ./bin/www -o ./logs/out.log -e ./logs/err.log && sleep 2 && sudo forever list
scripts.forever2: sudo forever --pidFile tol-node-public-TEST-55556.pid --minUptime 3000 --spinSleepTime 3000 -a ./bin/www -o tol-node-public-TEST-55556-logs.log -e tol-node-public-TEST-55556-err.log && sleep 2 && sudo forever list
scripts.foreverDebug: sudo DEBUG=express:* forever -p ~/tol-node-public/tol2-test --pidFile ~/tol-node-public/tol2-test/tol-node-public-TEST-55556.pid --minUptime 3000 --spinSleepTime 3000 -a start -c 'nodemon --exitcrash --delay 10' ./bin/www -o ./logs/out.log -e ./logs/err.log && sleep 2 && sudo forever list
scripts.restart: sudo npm run kill && sudo npm run forever
scripts.restart-debug: sudo npm run kill && sudo npm run debug
